title: Pre-season 8 ranked game rewards?
body:
So im currently bronze 1 and if i get silver right now would i get the silver border in January when season 8 starts?

Thanks

replies.body: Preseason ranked games don't have their own special rewards sadly. You don't get rewards when the season starts, but rather when they end to decide where you placed highest. Once the new season starts, you'll need to play through some placements again to get started with the new ranking season!
ok thank you very much for the quick reply and information :)
You won't get the border since preseason doesn't contribute to ranked rewards.  You'll need to play when the 2018 season stats to qualify for any rewards.
